title: Military Soldiers Bundle
description: +10.8K phrases of 8 different MILITARY SOLDIERS (or assassin, sniper, hacker) for Military, FPS, RTS, Survival, Action, Sci-fi games etc. Includes 2 Ver: Original and Radio (21778 files)
longDescription:
[ REAL HUMAN VOICE ACTORS - NO AI USE ALLOWED ]

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


This bundle includes the following packs:

Daniel - Military Soldier Voice Pack

Hunter - Military Soldier Voice Pack

Thomas - British Military Soldier Voice Pack

Boris - Russian Military Soldier Voice Pack (Eng)


Kate - Military Soldier Voice Pack

Lauren - Military Soldier Voice Pack

Grace - British Military Soldier Voice Pack

Nadia - Russian Military Soldier Voice Pack (Eng)


NEED the complete Military pack? CHECK our Ultimate Military Bundle!


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


A large variety of male and female MILITARY SOLDIERS that covers everything you need for your next project.

They can also be used as a Sniper, Assassin, Hacker, Marine, Captain, Hero, NPC character, etc.

Each voice pack includes 2 versions: Original and Radio.

That's 21778 files TOTAL! ~6 hours of sound!

This way you can use them as they are or apply any effect you desire to the original files.

These packs can be used for games such as: Military, FPS, RTS, Survival, Shooter, MOBA, Sci-Fi, Action-Adventure, Apocalyptic, Horror, simulation, Sandbox, RPG and more.

They can also be used for animation, videos, etc.

These unique royalty-free phrases were carefully mixed and mastered to match your project.


MAIN FEATURES:


  • 8 different voice packs in one bundle, a GREAT DEAL!
  • 10889 files (21778 with effects) made from +1100 unique phrases.
  • Includes 2 versions: Original and Radio.
  • The packs are divided by categories for easy access.
  • Top quality voice recordings, each line carefully edited and mastered to sit perfectly in your mix.
  • All files are in high-quality WAV (16 Bit 44.1 kHz Mono) format, organized and ready to use!
  • Perfect for video games, animations, trailers, YouTube videos, and all other audio / visual productions.


CATEGORIES:


  • Positive-Confirm
  • Negative-Refuse
  • Can't
  • Greetings
